{"fixed_xml":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
  <TEXT>6. Bey Herrn Haag an der Augustinerga     sind zu verkauffen:</TEXT>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Prideaun A. und N. Testam</TITLE>
    <DESCRIPTION>in einer Connex. mit der V   lcker-Historie</DESCRIPTION>
    <PLACE>Berlin</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1725</YEAR>
    <VOLUME>4. 1I. Tom. 1. Vol. 2</VOLUME>
    <PRIZE>Cattenburg</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Sapientia Mos. de Vita & Scriptis Mosis contra Deistas</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Amst.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1737</YEAR>
    <FORMAT>4.</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Bibl.</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>8r. 70.</VOLUME>
    <AUTHOR>Interpp. Reineccii</AUTHOR>
    <PLACE>Lips.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1737</YEAR>
    <FORMAT>8  .</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Bibl. Hebr.</TITLE>
    <AUTHOR>punctata Leusdenii</AUTHOR>
    <PLACE>Frf.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1694</YEAR>
    <FORMAT>12.</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Seldenus</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>de Diis Syris</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Lips.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1692</YEAR>
    <FORMAT>8.</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Gottschedens</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>critische Dichtkunst</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Leipzig</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1737</YEAR>
    <FORMAT>8v  .</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>B  dickers</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Grunds   tze der Deutschen Sprach</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Berlin</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1729</YEAR>
    <FORMAT>8v  .</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":5,"explanation":"Added XML declaration, wrapped the initial text in a <TEXT> tag, separated nested <BIBL> tags, and ensured all tags are properly closed."}
